activities: Individuals are invited to join the e-Rewards program.  On doing so and as part of the enrollment procedure, they provide e-Rewards with personally identifiable information, demographic information and psychographic information.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe is available to investigate unresolved complaints that do not involve human resources data, and the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and/or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) are available to investigate unresolved complaints that do involve human resources data.
